name: Starlit Promises
summary: Ever since your best friend’s parents died, she’s been struggling with her mental health. While visiting her in the hospital, she gives you a strange crystal as you discuss the arrival of the Centennial Comet, an event that only occurs every one hundred years. That night you awaken from a strange dream with one command left in your mind, “Seek the Crystal of Ananke!” What could it mean? Before you go back to sleep, you get a call that your best friend is missing. While searching for her, you encounter a strange yet handsome man, Orion. He demands answers from you that you don’t have, but disappears when two attractive strangers show up. They want answers too.
